A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

_88political.description: If the content is considered political in nature, reflecting views of the government it was published under.

_88application_name.description: Applications on GOV.UK only use lowercase letters and dashes

_88analytics_identifier.description: A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

_88absolute_path.description: A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.

$eref.description: A path with optional query string and/or fragment.

___segments_mode.description: For prefix redirects, preserve or ignore the rest of the fullpath. For exact, preserve or ignore the querystring.

$eref.description: A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.

___slug.description: Government slug, used for analytics, eg '1970-to-1974-conservative-government'.

___title.description: Name of the government that first published this document, eg '1970 to 1974 Conservative government'.

___current.description: Is the government that published this document still the current government.

_88national_applicability.description: An object specifying the applicable nations for this content item. If it applies to all nations, it should be omitted.

$eref.description: An object specifying the applicability of a particular nation.

___alternative_url.description: An optional alternative URL to link to for more information on this content item pertaining to this nation.

___label.description: The pretty-printed, translated label for this nation.

___applicable.description: Whether the content applies to this nation or not.
